welcome_messages: Hey hey, look who's joined us — welcome aboard, glad to have you here.
Big welcome to our newest member — take your time, settle in, make yourself at home.
You made it through — we're happy you're here. Grab a seat and jump in whenever you’re ready.
Glad to see you on this side of the gate. You’re in good company now.
Welcome in — no pressure, no rush. Just good people and good conversations ahead.
